text: James Bruce Walsh (born 1957) is an American geneticist whose research focuses on evolutionary and quantitative genetics. He has been Professor of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology at the University of Arizona since 2004. He discovered the moth species Lithophane leeae in 2009, and another moth species, Drasteria walshi, is named after him. ==References== ==External links== *Home page * Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:American geneticists Category:University of Arizona faculty Category:University of California, Davis alumni Category:University of Washington alumni
title: Bruce Walsh (scientist)
